mapper.select: SELECT chatroom_no as chatroomNo, member_unique_no as memberUniqueNo, member_id as memberId FROM mini_market_chatroom WHERE chatroom_no = #{chatroomNo}

SELECT c.chatroom_no AS chatroomNo, c.member_unique_no AS memberUniqueNo, c.chatroom_active AS chatroomActive, c.member_id AS memberId, i.member_item_title AS memberItemTitle, m.member_nickname AS memberNickname FROM mini_market_chatroom c INNER JOIN mini_market_member_item i ON c.member_item_no = i.member_item_no INNER join mini_market_member m ON m.member_unique_no = c.member_unique_no WHERE c.member_unique_no = #{memberUniqueNo} OR c.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mini_market_chatroom( member_unique_no, member_id, chatroom_active, member_item_no ) VALUES ( #{memberUniqueNo}, #{memberId}, #{chatroomActive}, #{memberItemNo} )
